item.title: 90-Minute Narrated Sightseeing Trolley Tour in Atlanta
item.description: Get familiar with Atlanta by hopping aboard a trolley bus for a 90-minute city tour. You'll board near Centennial Olympic Park and travel past many of the most important attractions in town, from the Martin Luther King Jr. National Historic Site to the Georgia State Capitol, while an on-board guide provides live narration.

image.alt: 90-Minute Narrated Sightseeing Trolley Tour in Atlanta

item.title: Atlanta's Black History and Civil Rights Tour
item.description: Atlanta is known as 'the Black Mecca' for its wealth of African-American culture and history—and this half-day, small-group tour offers a comprehensive introduction to the city's key neighborhoods, landmarks, and more. Pick between morning and afternoon tour times, meet your guide in Downtown Atlanta, and travel in an air-conditioned vehicle. You'll see neighborhoods like Sweet Auburn, will visit local Civil Rights landmarks, will immerse yourself in Black arts and culture, and more.

image.alt: Atlanta's Black History and Civil Rights Tour

item.title: 90-Minute Guided Sightseeing Tour by MiniBus
item.description: Whether you’re an Atlanta native or totally new to these southern city streets, this city tour by electric car or minibus is the perfect way to see the sights. Sit back and relax as a local driver/guide transports you through some of Atlanta’s top neighborhoods, including Old Fourth Ward, Inman Park and Midtown, and get an up-close look at civil rights monuments like the Martin Luther King Jr National Historic Site, as you listen in to expert commentary.

image.alt: 90-Minute Guided Sightseeing Tour by MiniBus

item.title: Atlanta Sightseeing Bus Tour
item.description: See the highlights of Atlanta on a 5-hour bus tour that includes stops at key sites such as the Martin Luther King Jr. National Historical Park. Your guide shares commentary throughout the tour as you travel to Krog Street Market, Ponce City Market, Centennial Olympic Park, Atlantic Station, and more. Have time to purchase lunch at the CNN Center, and enjoy a drive through the Buckhead neighborhood to view stately mansions. Includes guide, driver, and transportation in a climate-controlled coach.

image.alt: Atlanta Sightseeing Bus Tour

item.title: Midtown Atlanta Food & Cocktail Tour
item.description: Luxuriate in Atlanta’s thriving foodie scene on a gourmet walking tour with a small group. Try a variety of cuisines as you eat your way through a 4-course meal and try craft alcohol pairings over the duration of the tour. Avoid tourist traps and eat like a local with unique dishes at popular establishments and hidden gems.

image.alt: Midtown Atlanta Food & Cocktail Tour

item.title: Atlanta Food and Cemetery Tour
item.description: Sample delicious Southern dishes and learn about Atlanta's history during a leisurely walking and food tour in Grant Park. Stop into local eateries for tastings that might include dishes fried catfish and pork belly toast. Stroll past striking Victorian homes and the historic Oakland Cemetery. Your guide shares insights about the food scene and history of Atlanta on this small-group tour with generous eats.

image.alt: Atlanta Food and Cemetery Tour

item.title: Martin Luther King Jr. History Walking Tour
item.description: Explore Atlanta through the lens of the Civil Rights movement on this Martin Luther King Jr.-themed walking tour of the Sweet Auburn neighborhood. See where the iconic Civil Rights leader worked and lived as you visit sites such as Ebenezer Baptist Church, the King Center, and the Martin Luther King Jr. National Historical Park. Throughout, your guide shares facts and stories about the Civil Rights movement in Atlanta.

image.alt: Martin Luther King Jr. History Walking Tour

item.title: Guided Bike Tour in Atlanta with Snacks
item.description: See Atlanta by bicycle on a tour that features beautiful neighborhoods, local artists, and historic landmarks. Cycling Atlanta can be intimidating if you don’t know the city's safe bike routes, but this tour is designed to follow quiet roads and paths. Along the way, you’ll get a local take on Atlanta’s vibrant culture, from a graffiti hotspot to the tree-lined lanes of Inman Park.

image.alt: Guided Bike Tour in Atlanta with Snacks

item.title: City Lights Atlanta Night-Time Tour with Photos & Dinner Stop
item.description: Discover a new side of Atlanta—and see the city's landmarks all lit up after dark—on this small-group, nighttime sightseeing tour. Meet your guide right in Downtown Atlanta, hop aboard your shuttle vehicle, and set off as the sun starts to set. You'll see local highlights ranging from Centennial Park and Mercedes Benz Stadium to Ponce City Market, the Old 4th Ward District, and more. Travelers will have the opportunity to visit Krog Street Marketplace for dinner on their own.

image.alt: City Lights Atlanta Night-Time Tour with Photos & Dinner Stop

item.title: Private Stranger Things "The Upside Down" Film Locations Tour in Atlanta
item.description: Discover the *Stranger Things* film locations in Atlanta with ease on this half-day private tour. A guide knows the quickest ways to reach the different sites where key scenes from the show were shot. Plus, you’ll ride comfortably in a private vehicle, with hotel pickup and drop-off included, while you listen to your guide tell you behind-the-scenes info as you go.

image.alt: Private Stranger Things "The Upside Down" Film Locations Tour in Atlanta

item.title: 2.5hr Guided Segway Tour of Historic Atlanta
item.description: Experience Atlanta like never before on this educational and entertaining guided, small-group Segway tour. See Atlanta’s historic sites and neighborhoods on a loop around the city. Learn about the history of civil rights at the Martin Luther King Jr. National Historic Site and Ebenezer Baptist Church. See the ongoing redevelopment of the Atlanta BeltLine and enjoy spectacular views of the city skyline from Oakland Cemetery. A guided Segway training session is included. Dress in weather-appropriate clothes with flat, closed-toed shoes.

image.alt: 2.5hr Guided Segway Tour of Historic Atlanta

item.title: 2.5hr Guided Segway Tour of Midtown Atlanta
item.description: Experience midtown Atlanta like never before on this educational and entertaining small-group Segway tour. See central Atlanta’s historic sites, landmarks, and architecture on a loop around the city. Visit the elegant homes in Ansley Park; the restaurant district; plus Centennial Olympic Park, host of the 1996 Olympic games and much more. A guided Segway training session is included. Dress in weather-appropriate clothes with flat, closed-toed shoes.

image.alt: 2.5hr Guided Segway Tour of Midtown Atlanta

item.title: 3-Hour Atlanta Beltline Food, Street Art and History Tour
item.description: Walk the streets of Atlanta historic Inman Park on a half-day guided walking tour and learn why this popular destination ranks tops among Atlanta's diverse food neighborhoods. Discover its history, sample regional delights and local cuisine from locally-owned restaurants, and explore the street art of the area like a local.

image.alt: 3-Hour Atlanta Beltline Food, Street Art and History Tour

item.title: Walking Dead Walking Tour on Private Filming Backlot
item.description: Fans of ‘The Walking Dead’ will love this guided walking tour of some of the filming locations in Haralson, Georgia. Choose from a morning or afternoon departure time, then visit places such as the Esco Feed Mill Complex to recount your favorite scenes from the show. Get behind-the-scenes information from the show, and enjoy some fun surprises along the way.

image.alt: Walking Dead Walking Tour on Private Filming Backlot

item.title: North Georgia Wine Country Tour from Atlanta
item.description: Get out of the city and explore the untapped beauty of North Georgia’s wine country on this full-day tour from Atlanta. Sample more than a dozen Georgia wines from local vineyards—admiring the area's gorgeous rolling hills on included transportation between stops—and then head to Helen for a chance to wine, dine, and shop in the Bavarian-inspired town.

image.alt: North Georgia Wine Country Tour from Atlanta

item.title: 2-Hour Food, History and Street Art Tour of Ponce City Market
item.description: Eat like a local in Atlanta during this guided visit to the Ponce City Market. Follow your guide through the converted historic Sears, Roebuck, & Co. building featuring a market hall including some of the city's best restaurants. Taste samples created by some local celebrity chefs and take a walk down Atlanta Beltline's Eastside trail. Admissions and food tastings included.

image.alt: 2-Hour Food, History and Street Art Tour of Ponce City Market

item.title: 2 Hour Historic Market Food Tour and Hands-On Biscuit Class
item.description: Get to know Atlanta’s excellent food scene and pick up some Southern kitchen skills in just a few hours with this combined market tour and biscuit-making lesson. Join your local foodie guide for a stroll through the city’s oldest market, stopping at four different stands for almost a dozen savory and sweet tastings. Cap off your time with a hands-on biscuit class to learn how to prepare this authentic Southern staple.

image.alt: 2 Hour Historic Market Food Tour and Hands-On Biscuit Class

item.title: 3-Hour Private Atlanta MCU Comics Inspired Film Location Tour
item.description: Explore the film and TV locations of Atlanta on a 3-hour private tour that includes pickup and drop-off. Travel in a comfortable private vehicle through the 'Hollywood of the South' and see locations from popular movies such as Black Panther, The Avengers, Loki, Falcon and the Winter Soldier, and more. Your guide shares commentary about the sites and movie lore of Atlanta throughout your tour, which includes private vehicle and guide, and hotel pickup and drop-off.

image.alt: 3-Hour Private Atlanta MCU Comics Inspired Film Location Tour

item.title: The Walking Dead: Private Film Locations Tour of Senoia
item.description: If you’re staying in Atlanta but want to see The Walking Dead filming locations near Senoia, Georgia, it can be almost impossible to do without renting a car. This The Walking Dead tour gives you a comfortable ride from Atlanta without the hassle of renting a car. See the fictional towns of Woodbury and Alexandria, as well as surrounding rural film locations with a guide who tells fun facts about the show and its cast along the way.

image.alt: The Walking Dead: Private Film Locations Tour of Senoia

item.title: Atlanta CityPASS®
item.description: Experience Atlanta’s must-see tourist attractions—and enjoy considerable savings—on this exciting Atlanta CityPASS. Visit Atlanta’s Famous Aquarium, the World of Coca-Cola, and Zoo Atlanta. Then choose between admission to 2 of the following attractions: Fernbank Museum of Natural History, Chick-fil-A College Football Hall of Fame, or National Center for Civil and Human Rights. This Atlanta CityPASS is valid for 9 consecutive days from the first date of use. Convenient mobile tickets are valid for 1 year from the date of purchase.

image.alt: Atlanta CityPASS®

item.title: Stone Mountain Park Sightseeing Tour
item.description: Simplify your visit to the incredible Stone Mountain with a half-day small-group tour. Learn about the natural history of this large mountain of granite at attractions throughout Stone Mountain Park. Explore the nature trails, visit the Stone Mountain Museum, and take the cable car to the summit for incredible views of the surrounding Georgia landscape. You’ll have plenty of free time to explore as you wish.

image.alt: Stone Mountain Park Sightseeing Tour

item.title: The Escape Game at The Battery in Atlanta
item.description: Spend time with friends, family, or coworkers during this escape room experience in Atlanta. Choose from several game experiences like Prison Break, Gold Rush, and Special Ops and solve puzzles and clues to escape the room within an hour. Groups must work together to use problem-solving skills and communication to get out of the room.

image.alt: The Escape Game at The Battery in Atlanta

item.title: Atlanta Indoor Skydiving Experience with 2 Flights & Personalized Certificate
item.description: Feel the thrill of skydiving without the stress or price tag attached to jumping out of a plane at iFLY Atlanta. After a private lesson, your instructor accompanies you into a vertical wind tunnel with speeds of up to 175 mph (282 kph). With a range of time slots available and year–round hours, this indoor skydiving simulation is a popular choice for visitors and residents in the Atlanta area.

image.alt: Atlanta Indoor Skydiving Experience with 2 Flights & Personalized Certificate

item.title: Atlanta Ghosts: Hauntings, Ghouls, and Phantoms of Atlanta
item.description: Discover Atlanta's spooky side—and get a new perspective on the city's Midtown neighborhood—on this evening ghost tour. After the sun sets, make your own way to the departure point, and set off with your guide. You'll stop by historical churches, theaters, and the sites of old haunted houses—and will learn all about the supposed hauntings and unexplained happenings that have taken place.

image.alt: Atlanta Ghosts: Hauntings, Ghouls, and Phantoms of Atlanta
